website_summaries.verdict: Although it looks similar to many, this model delivers considerably more power and endurance.
pros: Upgraded 500W motor provides more responsive performance, and 12.5Ah battery gives greater range
21 speeds provide good flexibility whether in full electric, pedal assistance, or standard bicycle mode
Detachable battery gives convenient off-bike charging
cons: Maximum speed slightly lower than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Bicycle motor does not power up!
customer_reviews.text: The control box was broken with missing wires right out of the box. Bicycle motor will not power up. Lights and horn work fine. This was going to be my first electric bicycle purchase. This has proven to be a very bad experience from Ancheer. The preassembly must have been rushed at the factory. I hope I can get a refund or my bike fixed. Customer support is not available. I have not taken this bike outside of the room I put it together in. It has not been ridden because it doesn’t work. I did get a full refund thanks to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shawps

customer_reviews.title: After a few seconds it kicks back again and this gradually gets progressively worse to the point that it does not turn back ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this for a ride after assembly and noticed the motor makes struggling noises and cuts off during pedal assist. After a few seconds it kicks back again and this gradually gets progressively worse to the point that it does not turn back on for a good 5 - 10 minutes. The bike is unridable now. It is very heavy and without battery assistance it is very difficult to ride. (Watch for yourself). The Hub motor itself or the controller is faulty. Trying to resolve this. I wouldn't buy this product or suggest anyone to as it is.
customer_reviews.author: L C S Reddy

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding this bike for about 2 months. as far as its electric capabilities go its pretty cool. how the bike is mechanically put together is a different story. the gear shifting is atrocious the chains skip and fail when i try to pedal. The seats uncomfortable and the headlight stopped working almost immediately.I could overlook all this and say it still works as a cheap basic ebike. However, after hitting a small bump the front fork snapped and sent me to the emergency room. this bike is just plain DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I thought I rated this once already. That’s ok, it’s worth doing twice. For the money, this is an unbeatable scooter. It arrived in perfect condition and every feature works as advertised. Have been able to ride it too much, my wife and I have managed a few miles and it’s really impressive for being so little. Zips me along at 20 mph on flat terrain and I weigh 300 lbs. I look funny on it, but it’s fun to ride, easy to carry. Lots of potential uses
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor failed after 3 rides
customer_reviews.text: Defective motor - failed after 3 short rides of about 1mile. I recommend you look at a different ebike. I purchased Ecotric fat tire bike, it is about $200 more, but has better quality and performance. I don't recommend this product or this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with my new electric bike
customer_reviews.text: I rode my new bike 1.5 miles in the bike lane in San Jose today. Now have two flat tires and the battery died (i did charge it for 6hrs the night before). I emailed Ancheer’s cust support dept at 3pm PST today to receive a bounce reply that they are closed already for the weekend. I assume they use cheap thin tires because i weigh 205lbs and cannot imagine any bike having three problems in less than 2miles of brand new useage. I had the bike on the medium pedal assist level. Is this a one-off lemon?
customer_reviews.author: Tony L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap low quality Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: The bike came with a bad battery and charger. Wheel did not line up causing the breaks to drag. The seat is hard as a rock and will need replacing. The steering stem was loose and rattled. Never got to ride the bike with power because the dead battery wouldn't charge. This may be a blessing as this bike could kill someone as others have reported. Not safe. Stay Away.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. I've added a few accessories and what not to it. I use it for commuting, grocery shopping, and fun rides. She's a real beaut and the battery lasts for ages. I've done over 26miles on a single charge which included several really big hills which is where I used the electrics the most. The only thing I find is that it's a bit heavy for lifting on and off the bus rack, but it's not a major. I ride quite a distance from bus stop to the office and it's nice to get to the office an not be hot and sweaty even in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne G. Mellett

customer_reviews.title: For the price I am shocked how good it is
customer_reviews.text: Mikes the bike is fast it climbs hills well its sturdy My friend has a German made 350 W bicycle this 500 W bicycle destroy his in terms of power Cons some of the parts are a little chintzy like the shifters and the speed controller the guard for the derailer was bent not letting it shifting to the highest gear when I got it the instructions on the assembly are nonexistent there is no rear suspension and you feel every single pebble in the road it is a rough ride
customer_reviews.author: Christopher O

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bike from November and I have a problem with front brake and disk and I can't used from November since I installed, I keep going back and forth with pictures and emails and from March 09 they decide to send me the parts , but they never send me the parts . I pay 600$ for a bike and I never used (come with warranty) , they not going to cover nothing under the warranty
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Seat broke right when I saw my 180lb butt on it
customer_reviews.text: The product came as described. I have two large complaints with this bike. First, I weight 185 lb and the first time I sat on the seat, it bent the nut that holds it into place and the bolt and it broke off. I literally fell off the bike. because of that, I haven't been able to ride it and had to go buy another seat from another store. the second problem that I have is that on the steering wheel there is a throttle like mechanism but it doesn't work. You have to act like you are pedaling to get any power.
customer_reviews.author: Girl

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure I would rate five stars if the front wheel wasn't broken.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure I would like if it could be assembled. The two bolts on the front tires are stuck on with some sort of clear adhesive, I've assembled plenty of bikes before and have never seen that before. After failing do get the bolts off so I can install the front tire I brought it to two different bike shops and both were unable to get them off. Weirdly, in all of the videos of people assembling this same exact model the bolts easily slid off, but not the ones I had gotten and I'm ultimately going to have to return this or hope for a replacement wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is so so
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month, I ride it along the beach in FL, on pavement. Battery does 15 miles when not pedalling, if you help it, can do 20-25 miles. Gears are useless, only 2 gears are accessible, gear system is really a piece of crap. Also the handlebar feels like it is alive, - might have to change it. Front wheel brakes are catching on break disk, have been adjusted many times now, but never sorted it out. That makes the bike going harder, i.e. wasting battery range and makes it harder to pedal the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Power assist cut-out
customer_reviews.text: I had this bike for about 1 yr. It worked just as I had hoped. Full electric should I need, pedal assist most times, and manual when I felt like it. In the last 4-6 weeks, the assist mode has been cutting out within 30 seconds of use. Power off & on and restart the handlebar power and we're back... for only 30 seconds. Ancheer has yet to help me with this. I have a standard bike right now... not a power assist bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but lacks quality.
customer_reviews.text: This bike "looks" sharp, but it lacks quality. When applying the front brakes the entire suspension fork twists like it is going to buckle. It is a low end bike. I still enjoy riding it, but I bought my wife a Rad EBIKE and the quality of that unit was very impressive. We would ride about 10-15 miles and my battery was dead. Her Rad bike still showed that it had 5 bars of power "FULL POWER" . SO I would end up charging my Ancheer after every ride and charge hers about once a week even though it still showed 4 bars. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great overall with some minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: Generally speaking, I have enjoyed the bikes I purchased. What I have been really impressed with is Jane, the customer service lady who always has tried hard to resolve the few minor issues I had. I strongly recommend that the company maintain its responsiveness and great customer service, as I will be returning as a customer for as long as the excellent customer service remains a feature of Ancheer's business strategy. I purchased multiple bikes from Ancheer and recommend their products. And thank you, Jane, for always being there to resolve my issues and questions.
customer_reviews.author: Forensic CPA

customer_reviews.title: Junk ebike
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? I have already purchased two other ebikes, both different from Electric boarding company. This was my third e-bike, first from Amazon. So far so bad. Arrived with cut wire to headlamp. The accelerator doesn't work. Pedal assist works BUT it kicks in for too long after you drop pedaling, this could result in serious danger. Top speed 9 mph, supposed to be 20 mph. My other two bikes are different models with the same motor and battery, both get 20 mph and great range. The shicks...what shocks? They look like shocks, even advertised as such, yet it's just a fork with no absorbtion.I'm extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I selected assembly when I purchased this, but it arrived at my house unassembled. Assembly is nontrivial. Now I have to pay an additional $100 before I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: bad company...........good bike
customer_reviews.text: my bike came with a warped rotor and a bad seatpost. im disabled and i use this bike to get to the store for food. when i asked the company to give the part # of the front rotor so i could get the part i need, you would think i asked for chinas' top secret tech science. they offered everything but. even money. this company will not take a chance with americans, you must document everything, and jump through every hoop. i wish there was a way to see these kind of people in advance. ............just sayin!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply built.  Not for off road
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the price. I wish they use better materials. The shock absorbers are very cheap they click on very small bumps. Breaks are ok. When you use the self assists a loud noise comes from the motor. Update: after using this bike on trails and bumpy terrain the battery started to cut off every time I hit a little bump. The shock absorbers are a joke. You can hear metal clicking on metal and very rigid ride. It takes over 5 pedals for the engine to engage and when you stop paddling it takes the engine several seconds to stop engaging. Very dangerous if you are on a trail. I am going to get another bike
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, surprised what quality you get for the low price.
customer_reviews.text: Especially for the price this is a surprisingly good electric bike. I’m working on lowering the number but I’m over 300#: this thing totes me around no problem. The battery life is great. The bits all work well. It’s not a high end bike with the feel of well engineered components; it’s more like a Ford Escort but it really is a great price, a good bike, and every penny spent on it is not wasted. It’s not a cheap bike, it’s an inexpensive low end, but quality, good, solid bike. I’m very impressed with how they pulled this odd and how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bike worked fine for six months until the battery died. Since then, I have been in a three month saga with their customer service department. Their English quality is very poor, and they refuse to refund me my money. Save yourself the trouble - it's not worth buying this poor quality ebike, even if it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle fan

customer_reviews.title: BIKE WILL NOT LAST A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: I had this bike for 11 months this is what broke down Brakes 1 month Crank set 4 months Battery 6 months would not hold charge Random parts falling off 6 months All that is fine except for the Motor failing 11months And theres no way to repair this thats the big issue
customer_reviews.author: ELIAS PAPADIMITRIOU

customer_reviews.title: WORST CUSTUMER SERVICE BY SELLER ..EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Battery dont recharge, switch for horn/ malfunction Seller unsupportive. DONT BUY THIS BICYCLE.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Motor died after 3 rides.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad. I really loved this bike. I was so excited to have it for the spring. It seemed solid and it was extremely fun to ride. Unfortunately, after 6 days of owning it and only 3 moderate rides, the motor started jittering and lost power completely. The ANCHEER seller was an absolute nightmare to deal with in attempts to get a replacement motor or controller. I was finally able to get a small refund from Amazon to hopefully find replacement parts and repair on my own. Buyer beware. It's a big risk because if it had continued to work, I'd have given it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: K-Jeez

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble! The only thing I messed up one was the quick release for the front wheel, I did not know all you had to do was slighted in! The bike was assembled out the Box in about 20 minutes taking my sweet time! I rode it for about 4 miles and it is perfect even though I am severely at a sheep! Tip- to go full throttle only hold the minus button and tap it but it says that in the directions! Very good for Florida! very happy! would buy again! plan to buy more! lol
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect first bike.
customer_reviews.text: My first ebike. Easy to assemble even one handed. Instructions that are included are poorly done but they point to an inline video that gives you everything you need to do a stellar job. Seat that comes with the bike is uncomfortable but I read that in reviews and purchased a gel seat with embedded light that was an easy swap. Also got metal pedals to replace the existing ones since I am 6 ft 4 in and my local bike shop strongly recommended that. Two upgrades and a greater starter ebike. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary McCarver

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, proubly gonna get one for her too.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is stronger then expected. I love that I can turn off petal assist and just use a throttle. Brakes do speak a little so I put a little brake grease on the disk, solved. I only need the motor when going up hill. I'm 6'2" 218lbs and a little out of shape but the bike fits me, a big dude, to my shorter half with easy adjustments and tools come with. This is a great way to get back on a bike if you live in hill area or if you need something that you can rely to get you where ever you want with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: randall stephens

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: Slow. My wife's little Nakto single speed with basket e bike goes faster with the motor than this. I thought surely this would be faster as the battery is larger and motor looks bigger. Wrong! Battery doesn't even last as long as hers. Needed charge while hers still had 1/4 life left. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dthacker

customer_reviews.title: This thing didn’t work, it was defective right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I would warn everyone to stay away from this bike and seller. The bike didn’t work right out of the box. Took the seller 6 months to get me a part so I could make the bike run. I had to rig it up because the part they sent didn’t fit properly. If you spend more the $400.00 on this bike, you will probably regret it. Both tires were flat by the time I finally got the thing to run. What a crap bike, with crap sellers and crap service. Avoid the trouble I went though and by your bike elsewhere. Good luck if you try these clowns.
customer_reviews.author: james G

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get it working their was something wrong with it ...
customer_reviews.text: couldn't get it working their was something wrong with it but sent it back got a refund might give them onother chance and reorder but it has to be built for me I cant do it ! got another one this time the right arm came off had to pay 100 to get it fixed but now the battery goes out fully charged it turns off by itself when going uphill this e-bike sucks now im going to have to get another one and im on disability so it will take a while this is my only sorce of traspertation
customer_reviews.author: samuel smith

customer_reviews.title: My son love it
customer_reviews.text: My son works far from home and do Uber eats so it cuts down alot manual pedalling. He still pedals but it's easier on his joints and knees and less exertion. Now it came with either the light or Bell broken probably from shipping, and also beginners slow down and don't get cocky. Manual bikes u can break stop in an instant, this bike no I'd u using battery and up the assistance level. So my son coming down a hill crash had bike on full assistance couldn't stop in time. Oh I need to know how to get a replacement key for his battery who do we call
customer_reviews.author: PatrishaPhilly43

customer_reviews.title: Worked well... for a little while
customer_reviews.text: Started out great, took it for short to medium rides, usually to nearby coffee shops to do some work. Speed was great, loved that I could set how much help I wanted. Then close to a year into owning it, the battery started acting funny and before long it wasn't making it even halfway on even shorter bike rides. I eventually gave up riding it because it's such a heavy bike to ride without the help. I guess I need to look into a new battery but I'm afraid it'll be too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Break nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shipping!! Can’t believe breaks are this horrible. Heard loud scraping sounds after using it once. Brought it to a bike shop and they said the breaks are horribly made and now need to spend over $100 for better breaks for my son to ride it . This is so frustrating. I spent so much money on this bike and now need to spend $100 more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 months or less of fun! Not a long term bike
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bike for 6 months before the battery broke and I tried getting in contact with the company and even Amazon and you can not get in contact with the company. Even the bike company who assembled the bike could not get in contact with them. Would not recommend if you want long term, but for 6 months it was super fun
customer_reviews.author: massa

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This E Bike is very well worth the price. It is well built such as the rims, brake disc's and peddle crank are all very straight and true. It rides very quiet, also showing good quality. With the battery and the motor, it makes the bike pretty heavy, but with the peddle assist, going up hills is a breeze. I've only had the bike 3 weeks and have only put on 24 miles, but I'm still on the first charge of the battery. I use the direct throttle mode mostly, that way I only use power when I need it instead of all the time that I'm peddling.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Adam

customer_reviews.title: Now the power keep getting off
customer_reviews.text: Got the bike assembly was easy the battery gives nice mileage and the speed is good too and its also a cool looking bike Update-: second day with bike stopped working the power is just getting off and cycle won’t run i had to use paddles i dont know what now this is the worst bike ever and i almost got in an accident because of this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kuljit

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.text: I feel completely cheated and will never buy from this seller again. Had it one week and the battery charge port breaks. Two weeks in and the throttle breaks completely. This is my only transportation to work and now I don't know what I'm going to do because God knows I can't keep buying one every few weeks. Do not buy this cheep piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great, easy to handle. It has great speed for the hills in San Francisco. The removebable battery is a must.
customer_reviews.author: G T.

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: This bike does exactly what I need it for. In full electric mode it gets me slowly but surely up the hill to or mail box; in assist mode it goes very well with a minimum of effort. And of course I have a regular bike for exercise. I like that I can easily remove the battery and charge in the house to avoid the temperature extremes in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard Leather

customer_reviews.title: Terrible so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Out if the bi. It looked great. Forks bent a bit but fixed that with a tub with large plyers. Put entire bike together. Went to use it. , no power on throttle nor pedal assist. I got it sept 4 th. Now it’s sept 11 and I am not getting anywhere with factory. They keep say to make a video. I sent video three times. I’m leaving in a week for a month camping trip and have no bike. Local shops won’t touch it. Verrrry disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Tubs and More Supply

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my adult son and he loves it. Most bikes I looked at were so much more expensive. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Fast Enough
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a great bike. I lived in China (Shenzhen) for 4 or 5 years and fell in love with E bikes there. This one was tough to put together because the instructions they sent were wrong. Basically the front tire has a quick release skewer, but the instructions were for a traditional style axel. So they need to update that. Other than that the bike is super fun. I have only put maybe 50 miles on it so far. Will update if something goes wrong. Otherwise my review remains 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: pedro101

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This bike did not come with instructions. but it was still easy to put together just by looking at a picture of the bike. In ebike gear it is not very good up hill. you can feel and hear the battery slowing down. In peddle assist the bike feels like is going faster then I am pedaling witch makes my foot slip off the pedals sometimes. I think the more I ride it the more I will get used to that.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Basic E-Bike for the Casual Rider
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ancheer 250W Electric Bike for my wife to encourage her to ride with me. She really enjoys riding it as it allows her to not tire out so quickly, as we live in a very hilly area. It is a solidly constructed bike with nice safety features included such as the horn and front light. It was easy to assemble, with hardly no adjustments needed for things like the brakes or the gear shift. And it has adequate power, with decent acceleration. The battery does take a while to charge (4-5 hours) and the range is around 90 minutes. All in all, it was a good purchase at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The battery only gets about 10 miles and its less than a year old.
customer_reviews.text: I could put it together OK but the back brakes were very weak. I took to a bike shop and they said to free up the cables ---they were too tight together.--- I bought new plastic ties and re- did them and now it works fine, it also shifts better. The seat is total crap, have to get a new one. It runs good and is a lot of fun. Not much torque but great for flatter trails. The battery only gets me about 10 miles -- i think about half of what I originally got.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Selby

customer_reviews.title: Great, but for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bike to get me to and from work; a five mile ride with mostly flat roads. I'm a little under 6' and weigh 220 lbs. While this is not a motorcycle, it's also not your average bike. I really don't have to do much pedaling, and it takes off. Can be tricky at first to learn and adjust to, but honestly, I'd never go back to having a standard bike again. Will see if it holds up over time! Will update or lower my rating if I need to. Sidenote: assembly was tricky and took about an hour or so given the vague instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Preston

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money to buy more reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. 1 of the motors on 1 bike failed after 3 months of use. Covered under warranty but it was a pain dealing with overseas intermediary that handles the claim between Amazon and Ancheer factory. Sent several pictures and videos until they conceded it was the motor. They claim to have sent me a motor from the factory in late-Sept 2019 but still waiting...curious to see if it will arrive, how easy it will be to replace, and if it will work after replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get back into exercising and have fun doing it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 69 yrs. Old. I'm not in to bad of shape. My health is good with the aid of medication and supplements. It's to much work for regular bike riding. We have hills everywhere. I have a moped but it wasn't worth the registration and insurance especially if you hardly ride it. Plus no real exercise. Now with this electric bike I'm riding into town for breakfast three days a week. It's about 10 miles round-trip. What's good is I can control the amount of exercise by the different button functions. Now I love bike riding again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The bike showed up with missing axle parts. Parts melded together from heat probably occurring during shipping. I had to have the front axle completely rebuilt and the bike tuned up prior to riding it. Chain broke during first ride
customer_reviews.author: Connie Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Is also rather inexpensive with some really good parts. It has Shimano gears and disk breaks ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not get extremely fast (I've gotten the bike to around 15 mph, but I was never expecting to go extremely fast. I rode about a mile a day to the bus stop and then lock it up and take the bus. The battery lasts about a week or two if I use the electronic as opposed to the assisted pedal mode and I do use the electric, but the pedaling is still an option because I can throttle while pedaling. Is also rather inexpensive with some really good parts. It has Shimano gears and disk breaks and the bike costs less than 750.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew DiMasi

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bike for my wife, who has been riding her 21 speed bike for years. I have a converted bike that is now an E-Bike. This is going to be hard to believe, but I only charged it when we received it, and today, two months later, I placed it on the charger for the firs time sine then, She has put 95 miles on bike, of course she is mostly peadling it, and only use the power going up steep long hills, and accelerating from intersections. This is got to be a new record for miles / battery charge! I only gave it a 4 star because the brakes squeak when applied to stop.
customer_reviews.author: ThuntDon

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike but worst customer service
customer_reviews.text: Writing review after 8 months of continues use: Yobido - Amazon Marketplace I commute with this daily around 10 miles smoothly. except: 0. WORST CUSTOMER SUPPORT. they are lairs. The bike is in warranty period but they are asking me to buy the battery from the market. 1. Seat is broken with movements 2. frequent flat tyres 3. Battery is almost gone but since this is detachable battery the connectivity b/t battery and rest of the bike is loose and disconnects automatically
customer_reviews.author: Mukesh

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a cheap Ebike
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful machine. It's lower cost sets it apart from the higher priced bikes. It's very well made & a joy too ride. You can certainly buy more expensive bikes. You will be hard pressed to find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: solid value for such a great price
customer_reviews.text: ebikes are expensive (most lines start at around 3-4K). I have had this bike for a few months now and I have been impressed by how solid everything is. The battery is great and everything works well! Of course, if I were to pay 5 or 6 K for a bike I would probably get something a little more refined, but this bike defenetely is a good value!
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike - Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is A-Mazing for the price, Came unassembled -- all parts included and undamaged. Amazon service assembled it for free -- great bonus having an expert show me how to use it. I am THRILLED with this bike: Disc brakes, shock absorbing front wheel -- rides like a dream. I added the Topeak Carrier and clip-on basket. It makes for a lean, mean shopping machine for the city!
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: I love the seat i love the bike its pedal assist ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on the 23 and got it on the 27th! It came early. I love the seat i love the bike its pedal assist up hill is great you could ride bike for miles without burning your legs at all! Electric mode could be faster! But for the price its a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Your Father

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the performance. Took me up a hill of 12 degrees and 500 feet long without my pedaling at all. Always easy to climb hills pedaling or not with pedal assist, so you can get exercise by pedaling or let the motor do all the work. Like disk brakes over the older style brakes that stop by closing in on rim of wheel. Disk brakes stop better. Only real thing that cost a star is comfort of seat. I put on a different wider seat.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M L

customer_reviews.title: The , when you have a problem company will not answer the phone.
customer_reviews.text: we bought two bike , the first came l tried to canceled it. It came the next day. The box was in a beat up condition. I know that they shipped me a returned bike , because the e mode never worked. and i have called them for two weeks and told them i was having this problem. and they never called me , or emailed I just got a girls bike from them , the bike was perfectly raped and the box was perfecte send me a bike that does not work ,,,but fix it
customer_reviews.author: Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: Great e-bike
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Ancheer Electric Mountain Bike to replace one that was stolen off of my patio (2017 model.) This is a really good e-bike, love the adjustable handlebar upgrade. This item arrived excellently packaged; the assembly was fairly easy; it works like a champ. As a sidebar note, I ordered from another supplier: a Cyclomatic Power Plus. It was an electric assist-no auto feature like the Ancheer (Though I don't use the auto feature). It was heavy, cumbersome, and failed after 2 weeks. I sent it back with no issues and ordered the Ancheer. It's a much better bike, & much lighter. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl K.

customer_reviews.title: Needed some work but a fun bike
customer_reviews.text: Great starter ebike but you better know a little about bike adjustments. The breaks needed adjustment because they made an annoying screech. A caliber adjustment was necessary. Although the noise and rubbing have been rectified the brake is now loose. It is a fun bike to ride but be prepared to buy a more comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tessasmom1

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for a commuter around school. Live in a very hilly area and it helps a lot! 2 days down an probably 10 miles battery still reads full. (Using it in full electric mode) it is good and will do just fine. Only thing is I wish I went for the little bit more expensive (like $50 more) 350watt model the extra power would be nice. But overall this bike is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this bike : )
customer_reviews.text: This bike is worth every penny - so nice to be riding out in the beautiful weather, enjoying the scenery and NOT huffing and puffing the whole time (but still getting plenty of exercise : ) Also, I highly recommend getting a big wide seat - way more comfortable than the seat that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyduck

customer_reviews.title: Great overall.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike overall. Assembly was not very difficult however if you are not familiar with working on bikes it may be a challenge. Mainly the front wheel. It can be difficult to align. Otherwise very simple. It is heavy, the shifters are cheap, and the seat sucks. But it performs excellent. All modes work great. The battery charger gets EXTREMELY hot while charging the battery. Overall great bike. Would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Annance

customer_reviews.title: Fun ride
customer_reviews.text: I just got the bike on May 11 2020. It came I a large box with tools to put-to-getter, the ride is great and smooth, half the battery is drained on a 45 min up hill ride an the gears don't change, last you have to keep pedaling to keep the bike moving (No Coursing). I will edit after 1 week to give my true thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Mc Neill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money, a great electric bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great electric bike at a very reasonable price. I paid extra to have a bike store check it over after I’d assembled it, and I’ve gradually upgraded the seat, tires, derailleur and added new lights, etc. But this is a great price for a good bike that gets you where you want to go. Battery range is excellent and the fact you can remove it to charge is convenient. I would recommend this bike for anyone looking to start with a solid, reliable electric bike.
customer_reviews.author: %HUSKYHIDDN%

customer_reviews.title: The back gear does not work
customer_reviews.text: I got it assembled and first thing I see that u can't use the back gear. So basically can only work with throttle mode. On top of this can't reach the customer care. So disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Anik

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: In addition to other reviews, my bike was under 2 feet of water when my house was flooded by Harvey. Water was as high as the battery connectors and the switch and I wasn't expecting it to be working. Surprisingly after cleaning it from the dirty water and mud it worked flawlessly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised, but some of the secondary parts ...
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised , but some of the secondary parts are cheap and breaking... kickstand broke after 2 days because i tiny plastic piece snapped . minor annoyances such as this
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this and the quality is very good, it came quickly next day, easy to put together,had the bike two weeks now so glad I bought this, I'm limited to what I can do I had a ordinary bike but became hard to ride, but my new ebike has given me a new lease of life can now go out a get some gentle exercise, I've done a few miles on it up some steep hills, that battery seems to last for ages it's never gone flat yet, would recommend if your thinking of getting one.
customer_reviews.author: ray m.

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. I use it to ride to work. It's a 12 mile hike with several hills. It climbs hills rather well for a 500w motor. In retrospect I should have gotten a 750w or 1000w. But this bike is great. Battery life is pretty good though once it hits 2 bars you better charge it because it will cut out randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Vuil Hond

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 17 year old son. He is 6'2 and 240 pounds. He is thrilled with this bike and loved the full throttle mode. Good spped and he thinks it rides like a motorcycl. Excellent buy. We had it shipped to a store and they assembled it free of charge and they demonstrated how to use all the funtions. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: smarty pants

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Great ebike.
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived in good condition. I am very happy with this bike. It is better than I expected. This is in excellent quality. It is comfortable to ride and folds up nicely for storage once you get to work.
customer_reviews.author: Leah tenniana

customer_reviews.title: This bike makes riding fun
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with the directions or should I say lack of. It said to connect the throttle wires which should have been marked but weren't. Apparently it was already connected but with other loose wires unable to determine what was what. Once that was figured out all was good! Amazed at how great the pedal assist works and actually makes riding fun and not so much work. So far so good. Good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: So Far --- Great I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it test drove it last night and did a little ride this morning after returning from my visit to the VA. I will update after some rides. I may use it to commute to some of my ping pong outings. Still haven't done much serious riding as the rain in Florida falls mainly on the biker & besides riding an electric bike in a lightening storm sounds like a bad match.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 500w instead
customer_reviews.text: This bike has been great for commuting and just fun riding. It goes about 15-22 miles an hour, it does great on grass and flat roads but when I when the up a some what steep bridge it would not go up, I then thought to myself I should have bought the 500w one but it’s fun. Within a week of having the bike both tubs went flat and I had to get thicker tubs and the tires were pretty worn so I bought new ones. Over all a good bike
customer_reviews.author: NasH AleX BeardeN

customer_reviews.title: Take good care of this bike if you buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I own the bike for at least a year And The bike is most impressive. The seat is not really comfortable but once you replace the seat it’s smooth biking. However I ask you to take very good care of the bike and make sure it’s not going to break on you. Because I couldn’t find a electric bike shop that would help me repair the PAS.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Starstone

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, An absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about the bike and it was delivered very quickly. It is an absolute nightmare to put it all together. It took me many hours to assemble it over 3 days and then I realized the little thing the chain goes over near the back wheel was broken and the metal on the chain was twisted. I requested to return the bike, but now I’m unable to take the front wheel off. So I can’t box it up. Even if I can, the box is ginormous and won’t fit in my car; so I can’t take it to UPS to drop it off. I feel like I basically flushed my money down the toilet with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chinmay Ratnaparkhi

customer_reviews.title: Very sad and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product for a month. So far so good. A little squeak to it but much cheaper than the other brand and works well so far. I am adding on to this review by saying. I purchased this bike a year and a half ago. The horn broke quickly. I am also concerned that if this bike breaks there are no bicycle shops locally that can fix it. I have asked around to three different stores in my area. 2018 So the bike is broke. The electric component stopped working and no one will fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri V.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter ebike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner ebike. I mainly use the bike while camping and plan on taking it on my trip out west to New Mexico this winter. Being a 69 yr old retiree, I did not want to invest over $700 in a eibike and this bike fit my budget. I made 2 modifications since I got it 2 weeks ago. One was a more comfortable seat and the 2nd was changing out the handle bars for comfort type bars that enables you to sit up more.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for commuting
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great! I was worried that the battery wouldn’t last but it makes it 20 miles at least before a charging. The electric assist is instant. The full electric throttle is nice too. It is instant unless the battery is low, then there is a 1 second delay, but nothing major. The tires are great for potholes and unexpected rocks. Update: about two months into having this bike, the back tire tube pops every single ride. Flat surface, short and long trips. It will be mostly fine for short trips but after sitting unused for a day it goes flat. I don’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole dailey

customer_reviews.title: Good basic electric bike.
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the price. Fun to ride and more powerful than I expected. Have ridden about 400 miles and have had some problems. Horn quit working after 2 weeks and seems to be in the light assembly. Looks like you might break the light trying to fix the horn so left the horn broken and just say beep beep now. Front tire had a flat and the tire and tube seemed really thin so replaced both with better ones. Good bike for casual riding.
customer_reviews.author: D. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our bikes not to long ago and we are thrilled with them! First of all it arrived super fast! Assembly was easy. And the power of the bike it’s just amazing ! Great purchase ! A MUST HAVE !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good e-bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new e-bike. The 500w motor gives me plenty of power. Assembly is simple enough if you are even reasonably mechanically inclined. I have only used my e-bike for relatively short trips so I can ride for a few days before I have to change my battery. I read reviews about the brake handles being on wrong side but mine came right. It's a good buy for the money, fast, and I love it.....
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Landry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and service
customer_reviews.text: I could not have gotten a better quality bike for the money I have put easily over 300 miles on it now the only issue I have had is a broken brake lever which was not the bikes fault and after I could not find a replacement they sent me one free of charge a1 excellent company
customer_reviews.author: William Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the cost of comparable e-bikes, this bike is an awesome value. Easy to assemble, plenty of power; if it had hydraulic brake calipers it would be perfect. That's the first upgrade you'll want to consider. It's an easy and relatively inexpensive upgrade. The stock brakes are ok but not great. You'll want the stopping power of hydraulic calipers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Got What I paid For
customer_reviews.text: Used for my 3 mile commute to work on flat paved roads. Pros: - Low Cost - Worked well for 9 months or so Cons: - Only lasted about 9 months. Now it shuts off every few seconds even on a full charge - Same as others listed - came with forks backwards, breaks backwards - Pedal bearing started seizing
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dettmering

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was easy. The speed of the bike is better than expected. The only draw back is high gear. The chain jumps off for some reason. I have to sort it out. I put a nice rack on the back for gear. I ride it to work and the lake. I also ride to work at night. The light works great. Super fast shipping. No damage. The handle bar mount was on backwards. Easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together due to lots of parts
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t pay to have this bike out together because the reviews said it is simple to do. I found that to be false. I had a difficult time and when it finally came together I took it for a spin and when I shifted the derailleur came off. I have no idea how to fix that. Other than that I find it’s a fun bike to ride. I haven’t taken it in the dirt trails yet and hope I won’t run into any problems. Overall it’s an okay bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pedal broke off on first ride.
customer_reviews.text: My pedal broke off on the first ride. Self propelled will not easily get you up steep hills
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Citrone

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Am Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The bike comes essentially assembled. Install handlebars, seat post and seat, and front wheel and it was ready to go. Bike moves at a comfortable bicycle speed, approximately 15 miles an hour on level. (I weigh 210 lbs.) Slower going up incline, but switching to peddle assist is easy to move it along with effort. Steep hills might be an issue, but the 21 speed gear set is also great. It's perfect for my wife. I recommend and would buy another one if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week of use
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week of use and am still in the process of fixing it after 3+ months of discussions
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: looked at the reviews and videos online and thought it would be worth it. bike worked for about 15 minutes then quit. Cannot get any replacement parts to repair, $600 dollars lose. save your money and get something that works. Update: The company did finally send me a replacement for the fried controller, have had the bike on several rides and it works fine, I removed twist throttle and I only run bike in low power to avoid burning up controller
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting..........
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, they ALWAYS ALWAYS has something doesn't match, and it will be VERY fun if you like DIY things. That's my second time bought their product. Last time their front fork doesn't work, I returned it and asked a refund (they sent me another front fork but there's another issue with that one........). This time the left paddle doesn't work......... And by the way, actually there's still problem with their front fork THIS time, but I solved it by using super glue...... It's simply disgusting....... I have no idea why I trust them again.........
customer_reviews.author: Tong Li

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT recommend Ancheer bike.
customer_reviews.text: I will not recommend purchasing this bike. I bought it at the end of Nov for a Christmas present for my adult son. He drove over a bump and the bike stopped working. We had an electrician even look at it, he could not find the problem. I had so many emails back and forth, plus phone calls which had gone nowhere. Unfortunately the bike stores in the area that sell electric bikes will not work on this bike. The bottom line is that I spent over $600.00 to get a bike that worked for a few months and now does not work. I also made the mistake of giving it a positive review when asked by potential buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pyrcz

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, worth every Benjamin!
customer_reviews.text: My father's day gift to myself. Clocked 800 miles since. It's been a lot of fun! And very useful around the farm. Strengths? versatile, reliable, easy to use, and simple to maintain. Weaknesses? the back break requires frequent cleaning and adjustments. tire flats due to goatheads in my area. after trying solid tires, ghetto tubeless, and three sealants, berrymans is best! Also had to loctite battery bracket to bike and shim up battery with a short coil of 1/4" tubing ( it also keeps battery dry when I'm caught in the rain)
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hay

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: I want to run out and get one right now. I peddled a little bit and it just took off it was fun to ride... ruin to play with the buttons and speed. It was easy to figure out how to turn it on and increased or decrease power. everything else was just like a normal bike. Let's me go to 20 miles which is a good amount for a small charge.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W Biere

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is really nice. Runs great! I did have to change the handlebars and seat so I’m not leaning over. Changed it really to a city bike. Love it!! For the quality of this bike I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bike
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price point, fast and very fun. I have not yet taken the bike for a long ride as it has been snowing at my house since it arrived. Very happy with crazy quick shipping. The install video is pretty poor but if you've ever done bike maintenance you can figure it out. It's definitely heavier than a normal mountain bike but the power makes up for it 10 fold. The tires don't look very durable and won't hold up too long in the desert out here. Overall I'm very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Landgraf

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike easy to install or put together. Slight damage to the derailor guard. It was pushed into the derailor dot it did not work. Easy fix with a little persuasion. Still give it a Five star
customer_reviews.author: Richie

product_meta.title: ANCHEER 500W/250W Electric Bike Adult Electric Mountain Bike, 26" Electric Bicycle 20Mph with Removable 12.5Ah/8AH Lithium-Ion Battery, Professional 21 Speed Gears
feature_bullets: 500W Motor: The mountain ebike is equipped with 500W high speed brushless motor, providing more than enough to power your daily commute, a cruise on the mountain, or a meander along your favorite trail. With speeds up to 20 mph, It will get you there swiftly.

12.5 AH Removable Lithium Battery: At the heart of the ebike is our large capacity 12.5 AH lithium-ion battery– giving you a range of up to 40 miles per charge. You can charge on/off the ebike by your convenience.
Adjusting Set: Making the Stem Length/Handbar Angle small changes can bring about noticeable improvements in comfort depending on what you’re trying to achieve !
3 Working Model: E-bike & Assisted bicycle & nomal bicycle , you can choose the E-bike to enjoy a long time travel, and also exercise. Combining two modes would be a better choice.

Service Available : With one-year Service for the electric motor, battery and other parts except for frame, no worry about using it. This bicycle arrives 85% assembled. It's not hard to finish aseembly by yourself. The assembly service on this page is provided and charged by Amazon’s third-party company, if you can't finish by yourself, click on the “Select Assembly ” button above; choose "Ship to store for assembly and pick up".

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
